auth.login-first: You have to log in first.
auth.incorrect-login-data: Email or passport is not correct.
auth.user-not-found: Please log in again to continue.
auth.verification-send-failed: We couldn't send you a verification email. Please log in to try again.

user.signup-check-email: Account created. Please check your email to verify your account.
user.cannot-send-email: We couldn't send the verification email. Please try logging in again to resend it.
user.already-exist: User already exists. Try logging in.
user.username-already-taken: Username already taken. Please try another one.
